ComicInfo.Summary:
The European invasion continues! Featured this issue are The Adventures of Fred and Bob by Cailleteau and Vatine, The Reformed Dragon by Leopoldo Duranona (author of The Race of Scorpions), as well as the continuations of Adele & the Beast by Jacques Tardi, Rork by Andreas, The Lone Sloane by Phillipe Druillet, and Fever in Urbicand by Peeters and Schuiten. All this, and a full-color cover by Duranona!
*Story Titles* Fever in Urbicand Chapter 3 Dark Horse Eyeball Kid: One-Man Show Geoff Darrow... The Man The Adventures of Fred & Bob: Convertible Dilemma! God Is Love Rork Chapter 3: The Stain The Extraordinary Adventures of Adele Blanc-Sec: Adele & The Beast Chapter 3 Lone Sloane Chapter 3: Rose
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/cheval-noir-3/4000-31815/
